participants.name: Evrim Eksi
participants.title: Technical Recruiter at Information Control Company

messages.message:
ICC Columbus Ohio

Hi Brian, 

How are you? I came across your profile as I was looking to network with a Full Stack Engineering professional. Our company, Information Control Corporation, has a rapidly growing practice. We are based in Central, Ohio. Would you be open to chatting on the phone sometime in the near future? Iâ€™d like to learn more about you and your current career goals. If so, please feel free to grab sometime on my calendar by going to calendly.com/neksi. In the meantime, please feel free to review our website at: http://www.icct.com/. Thank you for your time and I hope to hear from you soon. 

Best,

Nate

Evrim Eksi
740-350-0710 | neksi@icct.com
